Overview For gstBT_Node Members Chapter

gstBT_Node

gstBT_Node( ) ;

~gstBT_Node

~gstBT_Node( ) ;

axis

int& axis( ) ;

Active axis access method.

depth

int& depth( ) ;

Depth of this node.

getChild

gstBT_Node* getChild( int i ) ;

Get the ith child node. Note unsafe behavior.

getChildren

void getChildren( int axis , const gstPoint& origin , gstBT_Node** nearP , gstBT_Node** farP ) ;

Sort both children into a "near" and "far" division relative to a particular axis and plane.

getParent

gstBT_Node* getParent( ) ;

Get the parent node.

getTree

gstBinTree* getTree( ) ;

Get the partition tree which contains this node.

maxPt

gstPoint& maxPt( ) ;

Access minimum extent point.

members

gstBT_GeomObjList& members( ) ;

List access methods.

minPt

gstPoint& minPt( ) ;

Access minimum extent point.

setChild

void setChild( int i , gstBT_Node* child ) ;

Set the ith child node. Note unsafe behavior.

setParent

void setParent( gstBT_Node* p ) ;

Set the parent node.

setTree

void setTree( gstBinTree* t ) ;

Set the partition tree which contains this node.
